description: Try our easy to follow Plain Chocolate "Pocky" recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Plain Chocolate "Pocky" Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 150Â°C. Grease a baking tray or line with baking paper.

Add flour, sugar, baking powder and salt to a food processor. Process until well combined. Add spread and milk. Process until a dough forms. Turn dough out onto a floured bench top and knead until smooth. Roll out with a rolling pin until 5mm thick. Cut dough into 1cmwide strips.
Lay strips onto a tray. Brush with egg white. Bake for 25 minutes. Remove from oven and cool on tray.
Zigzag melted chocolate over and lay on a baking paper lined tray. Chill until set.
